explains: adj. 荣誉的；（职位）无报酬的，义务的；（成员）名誉的
wordGroup: honorary president 名誉会长，名誉主席

sentences.en: Harvard awarded him an honorary degree.
sentences.cn: 哈佛大学授予他荣誉学位。

sentences.en: An honorary degree was conferred on him by Oxford University in 2001.
sentences.cn: 牛津大学于 2001 年授予他荣誉学位。

sentences.en: The United States bestowed honorary citizenship upon England's World War II prime minister, Sir Winston Churchill.
sentences.cn: 美国授予了二战期间的英国首相温斯顿·丘吉尔爵士荣誉公民的称号。
